author: Novara Chadwick
comment: Am I the only one who can't even log on? But then have no problem logging on through my desktop? This is frustrating.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Novara! This situation is not normal, please contact our team in order for us to do verification and assist you. You may dial 1-800 224-7737 options 2 and 2. Thank you! - Geneviève

author: Kelsey Duerksen
comment: Ever since upgrading to Oreo 8.1 the app crashes every time on startup. I had to install it on another phone running 7.1 to get it to work. Very frustrating.

author: jonathan lesperance
comment: Trouble with view scaling while using check deposit, but beside that it works ok (Samsung Galaxy Note 4)

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Thank you for your comments, Jonathan! We appreciate it and it is duly noted. - Geneviève

author: Marlin Lichti
comment: The app description says you can look at your Desjardins credit card, and it accepts the login I use on the website, but there is no info about me VISA anywhere!

author: Maxime Franco
comment: Appareil incompatible avece déverrouillage par empreinte? Cette fonctionnalité est pourtant disponible sur n'importe quelle autre application... Une excuse pour ne pas corriger un bug de votre part et ne pas s'embêter avec les appareils plus anciens (3 ans et plus. Pas si anciens). Plus vraiment si utile que ça cette application maintenant qu'il me faut autant (voir plus) d'étape que sur la version Web pour accéder au détail de mes comptes.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Rebonjour Maxime! La fonction incluse dans votre appareil est effectivement incompatible avec nos services mobiles par mesure de sécurité. Je suis sincèrement désolée pour les inconvénients que cela peut vous causer. - Geneviève

author: Daniel Lang
comment: Only Ontario and Quebec. Garbage.

author: Jeremy Leeper
comment: Inccapable de mettre des notification

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Bonjour Jeremy! Je ne suis pas certaine de comprendre votre commentaire. Pouvez-vous m'écrire à l'adresse info@desjardins.com à l'attention de Geneviève? Il me fera plaisir de vous aider! - Geneviève

author: fab rose
comment: Great app, but got notification working from profil and  preference option and not from login screen !!!

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Thank you for your time and comments. We appreciated it! - Geneviève

author: Alexandra Mutchnik
comment: I'm writing to you, so you will create a request to programmers to verify and fix. When I do mobile deposit, it says "session timed out". This happens when automatic camera cannot read front of the check automatically and it asks me to take picture manually. Please, send to developers to test and increase the timeout. Thanks. PS: I've called this number many times. This is software problem.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Alexandra! As mentioned in our last comments, more verification is necessary. As your issue as not been mentioned by our members and our teams, we need more information. Should you not want to call, please write us at info@desjardins.com addressed to Geneviève and we will try our best to do it by email. Thanks! - Geneviève

author: Daniel Jackson
comment: won't work anymore for my android 4.1 , using web site .not very happy. ..any solution?

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Daniel, to insure operating reliability and security, the Desjardins mobile services app  requires that your mobile device be equipped with at least Android’s  4.4 version. Please note that Google has ended the support for those versions in 2015. However, we are sorry if this causes any inconvenience. - Geneviève

author: basheer essa
comment: Hi, I got Huawei's Honor 7 with android OS 6, for some reason the fingerprint feature isn't working with your app, I just can't enable it through the setting its greyed out, however the phones fingerprint works just fine with other banks apps. Thx

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Basheer! Thank you for writing us. Should you not be able to activate the Fingerprint function, it would indicate that the Fingerprint configuration isn't compatible. It often happens when a phone doesn't have a physical keystore. - Geneviève

author: Charles Cormier
comment: Well happy im not doing banking with this ! Atleast other banking institutions still support older android devices! Never was a fan of these guys!

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Hi Charles, as you are using a phone equipped with Android 6.0 at the moment, you should have access to our mobile services. However, note the Desjardins mobile services app requires that your mobile device be equipped with at least Android 4.4 for security purposes. Google has stopped supporting previous version since 2015.

Thank you - Geneviève

author: Jose Alexandre
comment: Très pratique pour déposer des chèques sans être obligé de sortir de chez nous.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Merci beaucoup pour cette belle note Jose! Nous apprécions beaucoup votre geste! - Geneviève

comment: I did give a bad review for a previous version, but I take it all back. It has improved and does the job fine.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Thank you so much! :)

We are very glad you like it! - Geneviève

author: Xavier Bourgault
comment: Impossible d'avoir un specimen cheques avec l'option pour le faire, bug et crash assez commun

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Bonjour Xavier! Il y a en effet, actuellement une problématique au niveau du spécimen. Sachez que notre équipe travaille à rétablir le tout et nous sommes désolés pour les inconvénients occasionnés. Je vous reviens dès que c'est réglé. Merci! - Sarah

author: Jean-Baptiste Morin
comment: App qui fait ni plus ni moins que ce qu'on attends d'elle.   Le login par empreinte digitale ne fonctionne plus et c'était la fonctionnalité principale qui justifiait sa présence sur mon téléphone.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Bonjour Jean-Baptiste! Malheureusement, l'appareil que vous possédez n'est pas compatible avec la fonction de déverrouillage par empreinte, ceci afin de garantir la sécurité de vos informations.  Je vous remercie toutefois d'avoir pris le temps de nous écrire. Bonne journée! - Geneviève

author: Norah
comment: The mobile deposit has stopped working. Other than that I had no problems before.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Norah! The mobile deposit function was indeed encountering some issues the day you left your comment. Make sure that our team worked as fast as possible with our business partners in order to solve this issue. We are very sorry for any inconvenient this may have caused you. Thank you for your time! - Geneviève

author: Victor Medvedev
comment: 4* because there is no way to deposit a USD cheque into my USD account.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Bonjour Victor! En effet, la fonction « Dépôt mobile » permet uniquement de déposer des chèques en devise canadienne. Je fais parvenir votre commentaire à l'équipe, comme suggestion d'amélioration. Merci d'avoir pris le temps de nous écrire. Bonne journée! - Sarah

author: Treble Effects
comment: Thanks to the tech support for the quick reply on how to do an e transfer on Android. Definitely brings another star to the app!

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi there! In order to chose another beneficiary, we invite you to add a second  one at first. To do so, please click on "More" and "Manage recipients". Should you need assistance, please contact our team at 1-800-224-7737 options 2 and 2. Thank you! - Geneviève

author: J Michael A
comment: Works fine, sometimes the fingerprint log in does not work but all in all it does what it is supposes to do.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Thank you for your comments! Should you have more problems with the fingerprint function, do not hesitate to contact us at 1-800-224-7737 options 2 and 2. 

Have a nice day! - Geneviève

author: Alex Sti
comment: Can't open specimens cheque in a pdf

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Hi Alex! We do have an issue with this function. Our teams are working in order to solve the issue as fast as possible. However, we are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused you. In the meantime, you may use the full website. 

Lastly, we will get back to you as soon as the issue is solved. Thank you for you patience! - Geneviève

author: Jean Simard skinless Overgrindozed
comment: This app rock solid for me,no issue at all thanks Desjardins

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Thank you very much! :) - Geneviève

author: Olivier Pilotte
comment: continuous improvements are very welcome, keep up the good work!

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Thank you so much Olivier. Glad you like it! :) - Geneviève

author: Gabriel roy-perras
comment: Great app!

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Thank you very much Gabriel! We really appreciate your time. :) - Geneviève

author: Rick Martin
comment: Good apps.. going Well since the last updated !! All going well on my Note 8

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Hi Rick! The issue is indeed solved. Thank for your new comments and your time.

Should you need it, I stay available for you. Sorry again for the inconvenient.

Have a great weekend! - Geneviève

author: JJ Math
comment: Won't open on my lg g5 since last update.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi there! We would like to have more information on this issue, please contact us at 1-800-224-7737 options 2 and 2. Thank you! - Geneviève

author: John Saint-Louis
comment: I liked the app but I can't toggle on the fingerprint to unlock. Can you please fix this it's not working only with this app.  J'ai aimé l'application Mais Je ne peux pas activé les empreintes digitales pour débloquer.  Pouvez-vous,  s'il-vous-plaît arranger ça. Ça me marche pas seulement avec cette application. Edit: mon téléphone est un Galaxy A5 2017 et vous aviez écrit s5. Vouliez-vous dire le A5?

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Oui John, vous devriez avoir reçu un 2e message avec ceci:

En fait, cet appareil n'est pas malheureusement pas compatible. Le déverrouillage par empreinte nécessite un « keystore » physique (sorte de coffre-fort) est un des prérequis pour l’authentification par empreintes digitales sur Android. Le Samsung A5 n'en possède pas. - Geneviève

author: Jean-Daniel Obermeir
comment: One of the better banking apps I've used. However I dislike the mobile browser feel it has on certain areas of the app. Sometimes it even reverts to the desktop version of accès d

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Jean-Daniel! Thank you very much for your comments. Duly noted. Have a nice day! - Geneviève

author: hazmatsystems1
comment: Like mentioned before keeps crashing on Note 8 since update.  Please fix quickly I use the app all the time

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Hi! We have fixed the issue. Therefore, I invite you to update the app and then try again. 

Should you need it, I stay available for you. Sorry again for the inconvenient.

Have a great weekend! - Geneviève

comment: The app keeps crashing in my note 8. Was working fine and suddenly stops working. The android version is upto date.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Hi Santhosh! We have fixed the issue. Therefore, I invite you to update the app and then try again. 

Should you need it, I stay available for you. Sorry again for the inconvenient.

Have a great weekend! - Geneviève

author: Carmin Pierre
comment: Called them and the problem still persist! The app keeps crashing om my Galaxy Note 8. I have the latest update and my android version is 7.1.1 . I am disappointed by the team that can handle the bugs of this app.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Hi Carmin! We have fixed the issue. Therefore, I invite you to update the app and then try again. 

Should you need it, I stay available for you. Sorry again for the inconvenient.

Have a great weekend! - Geneviève

author: Brock Short
comment: ** update **** wow instabalance is truly  a practical feature nice to see this sort of innovative advancements. Next thing should be nsf notifications that could allow Desjardins clients to intervene by doing a deposit before the nsf would take full effect or even perhaps avoided entirely!  **update** Superb presentation on the new look of the accessd page. Very professional look and feel, like this bank means business! Nice to see that desjardins is still the best at online banking interface on mobile just like their desktop banking  interface has always been miles ahead of the competition in simplicity functionality and presentation.  Ive noticed these intensive negative reviews and it seems they are from a disgruntled designer of the old interface lol. The language in the reviews doesn't exactly seem like its written by people of good taste :). As for transfer issues i didn't experience them and successfully transfered both between local accounts and e-transfer.   Since I feel these reviews are immature and unjust I am obliged to compensate by giving a full 5 stars.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Wow Brock! Thank you for your kind words. We are glad you liked our update! 

Moreover, please know that as of recently, we do notify our members in their account if a preauthorized payment could not be completed. At the second attempt only, NFS fees will apply.

Have a nice day! - Geneviève

author: Francesco Capaldo
comment: I'm having issue to change the amount of a payment. Always telling  me the date is not good even if choosing a later day.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Francesco! Could you delete the app and download again? Should the issue still be unresolved, please call our team in order to do more verification at 1-800-224-7737 options 2 and 2. Thanks! - Geneviève

author: Dom B.
comment: Ça ne fonctionne plus sur le Samsung Galaxy Note 8 depuis la nouvelle mise à jour...

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content:
Bonjour ! Notre équipe investigue cette problématique. Nous vous reviendrons dès la résolution de ce problème. Désolés pour les inconvénients causés. 

Je vous remercie de votre patience et bonne journée! - Geneviève

comment: App keeps crashing every time I open it ! I can't even open it for a minute !! Its ridiculous ! Please fix this

author: Jonathan Lacroix
comment: Love the app Bring back plain non see through boxes or give the choice in back ground the one with green stripes makes it distracting    Absolutely dislike the new layout.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Jonathan! Thank you for taking the time to give us your opinion. Make sure that your comments are noted. Have a nice day! - Geneviève

author: Dany Jadot
comment: Le défilement des transactions sur Android est enfin fluide! Bravo!

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Bonjour Dany! Contente de savoir que nos mises à jour vous plaisent. Merci pour vos commentaires! - Geneviève

comment: Can't open the app, crashes on my Note 8

author: daisy randone
comment: Simple et complet.

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Rebonjour Daisy! Merci beaucoup d'avoir pris le temps de modifier votre commentaire. Contente de voir que notre app vous plait. Merci pour votre temps et passez une excellente journée! - Geneviève

author: Sara Benkhayat
comment: One star till fixed Too many bugs lately especially with the instabalance App restarts and crashes frequently Please fix   Hello again, issue solved after recent update,

reply.author: Desjardins
reply.content: Hi Sara! I'm glad the issue is now fixed. Never hesitate to contact us again, should you need it. Have a nice day! - Geneviève
